Vital Spell.name: Vital Spell
Vital Spell.flavor: Your mastery of preserving allows you to conserve the fleeting vitality of your enemy to invigorate an ally.
Vital Spell.effect: You can use one of your arcane at-will attack powers as a free action. If you hit, you deal 1d10 extra damage, and you or one ally within 10 squares of you can spend a healing surge.

Light of the Lost Sun.name: Light of the Lost Sun
Light of the Lost Sun.flavor: You radiate scintillating light that burns into the minds of your enemies and fills your allies with light and life.
Light of the Lost Sun.onHit: 2d10 + ability modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and cannot recharge powers (save ends both).
Light of the Lost Sun.effect: The attack creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss it as a free action. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Any ally within the zone who hits with an attack deals 2d6 extra radiant damage or regains hit points equal to your primary ability modifier.
